name: Galavant
description: Controls: - W, A, S, D for movement - Spacebar for ability Features: NOTE: When you pick up one ability, you lose another. - Neutral, Fire, Ice, and Dash ability - Spike Traps - Puzzles + more! Description: You're a knight who awakes in a dark dungeon with a magical aura surrounding it. Armed with nothing except your sword, navigate the dungeon to collect mystical powers and solve your way through elaborate traps and fight for your freedom.
